sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useRef } from 'react'
import * as d3 from 'd3'

const BoxPlot = ({ data }) => {
  const svgRef = useRef()

  useEffect(() => {
    d3.select(svgRef.current).selectAll('*').remove()

    if (!data || data.length === 0) {
      return
    }

    const width = 928
    const height = 600
    const marginTop = 20
    const marginRight = 20
    const marginBottom = 30
    const marginLeft = 40

    const boxWidth = 70
    const minBoxSpacing = 30
    const totalWidth = (boxWidth + minBoxSpacing) * data.length

    // Obter valores mínimos e máximos de cada dataset
    const minValues = data.map((dataset) => d3.min(dataset.values))
    const maxValues = data.map((dataset) => d3.max(dataset.values))

    const minAll = Math.max(0, d3.min(minValues)) // Limitar o mínimo a zero
    const maxAll = d3.max(maxValues) // Ajustar para não ter +2, pois isso pode criar um range excessivo

    // Escala do eixo Y
    const y = d3
      .scaleLinear()
      .domain([minAll, maxAll])
      .range([height - marginBottom, marginTop]) // Invertendo a escala

    const svg = d3
      .select(svgRef.current)
      .attr('width', '100%')
      .attr('height', '100%')
      .attr(
        'viewBox',
        `0 0 ${totalWidth + marginLeft + marginRight} ${height + marginTop + marginBottom}`
      )
      .style('font', '10px sans-serif')

    const g = svg
      .append('g')
      .attr('transform', `translate(${marginLeft},${marginTop})`)

    const datasetWidth = totalWidth / data.length

    data.forEach((dataset, index) => {
      const data_sorted = dataset.values.sort(d3.ascending)
      const q1 = d3.quantile(data_sorted, 0.25)
      const median = d3.quantile(data_sorted, 0.5)
      const q3 = d3.quantile(data_sorted, 0.75)
      const interQuantileRange = q3 - q1

      const min = Math.max(0, q1 - interQuantileRange * 1.5) // Limitar o mínimo a zero
      const max = q3 + interQuantileRange * 1.5 // Não precisa de Math.min porque estamos lidando com IQR

      const x = index * datasetWidth + datasetWidth / 2

      // Linha do range
      svg
        .append('line')
        .attr('x1', x)
        .attr('x2', x)
        .attr('y1', y(max))
        .attr('y2', y(min))
        .attr('stroke', 'black')

      // Caixa
      svg
        .append('rect')
        .attr('x', x - boxWidth / 2)
        .attr('y', y(q3))
        .attr('height', y(q1) - y(q3))
        .attr('width', boxWidth)
        .attr('stroke', 'black')
        .style('fill', '#69b3a2')

      // Linhas da mediana e quartis
      svg
        .append('line')
        .attr('x1', x - boxWidth / 2)
        .attr('x2', x + boxWidth / 2)
        .attr('y1', y(median))
        .attr('y2', y(median))
        .attr('stroke', 'black')

      svg
        .selectAll('line.quartiles')
        .data([q1, q3])
        .enter()
        .append('line')
        .attr('x1', x - boxWidth / 2)
        .attr('x2', x + boxWidth / 2)
        .attr('y1', (d) => y(d))
        .attr('y2', (d) => y(d))
        .attr('stroke', 'black')

      // Rótulo
      svg
        .append('text')
        .attr('x', x)
        .attr('y', height - margin.bottom / 2)
        .attr('text-anchor', 'middle')
        .text(dataset.label)
        .style('font-size', '12px')
        .attr('fill', 'black')
    })

    // Eixo Y
    svg
      .append('g')
      .attr('transform', `translate(${marginLeft},0)`)
      .call(d3.axisLeft(y).ticks(null, 's'))
      .call((g) => g.select('.domain').remove())

    // Eixo X
    svg
      .append('g')
      .attr('transform', `translate(0,${height - margin.bottom})`)
      .call(
        d3.axisBottom(
          d3
            .scaleLinear()
            .domain([0, data.length])
            .range([marginLeft, totalWidth - marginRight])
        )
      )
  }, [data])

  return <svg ref={svgRef} style={{ width: '100%', height: '100%' }} />
}

export default BoxPlot
